IN.IC: je oblika za sedanjik, preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
To hit someone or something
pomeni nekoga udariti ali zadeti.

seg.quote: He hit the burglar on the head with a candlestick.
He never hit the ball very far.
The truck had hit a wall.
Enormous hailstones hit the roof of the car.

sense.def:
Kadar bomba ali kak drug izstrelek
hits its target
, doseže svojo tarčo.

A hit
je dejanje ali posledica dejanja, pri katerem bomba ali kak drug izstrelek zadene cilj ali tarčo.

seg.quote: The tanks were designed to withstand anything except a direct hit.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
hits a person, place, or thing
, močno prizadene osebo, kraj ali stvar.

seg.quote: Spectator sport has been badly hit by the increase in ticket prices.

sense.def:
Kadar neko čustvo ali zamisel
hits someone
, se tistega čustva ali tiste zamisli oseba nenadoma začne zavedati.

seg.quote: The shock of her death kept hitting me afresh.
Suddenly it hit me: my diary had probably been read by everyone in the office.

sense.def:
A hit
je plošča, igra ali film, ki je zelo priljubljen ali uspešen.

seg.quote: The play became a tremendous hit.

sense.def:
To hit on an idea
ali
to hit upon an idea
pomeni domisliti se neke ideje.

seg.quote: He hit on the idea of cutting a hole in the door to let the cat in.
